sql-item.sql: select a.item_id,a.supplier_id,u.user_id,r.mobile ,w.openid,u.`name` From b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_bidding a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcements i on a.item_id=i.uid INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity ui on ui.company_id=a.supplier_id INNER join b2b_user.uuc_user u on ui.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id left join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid left JOIN ( select user_id,send_times from dotnet_operation.op_wx_message_log_special where bussiness_type=11 ) wxc on u.user_id=wxc.user_id WHERE i.created_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -20 MINUTE) and DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE) and i.register_end_date>now() and i.procurement_type=0 and ifnull(r.mobile,'')<>'' and w.userid is null and wxc.user_id is null GROUP BY u.user_id ,w.openid

sql-item.sql: SELECT a.uid,a.title, case WHEN item.service_area='china' then '全国' ELSE area.item_name end as areaName, ( select CASE WHEN basq.province_code='china' THEN '全国' ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(IFNULL(area2.item_name,area1.item_name)) END from b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_service_area basq LEFT JOIN b2b_parameter.bizp_area area1 on area1.item_code=basq.province_code LEFT JOIN b2b_parameter.bizp_area area2 on area2.item_code=basq.city_code where basq.bid_announcement_uid=a.uid ) as serviceAreaName, if(ifnull(cond.project_count,0)=0 and ifnull(cond.register_fund,0)=0,'暂无', if(ifnull(cond.project_count,0)>0,concat('注资',cond.register_fund,'万元及以上，案例',cond.project_count,'个以上'),concat('注资',cond.register_fund,'万元及以上'))) as register_condition, bbf.category_name,ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name) as company_name,ifnull(cond.register_fund,0) as register_fund, date_format(a.created_time,'%Y-%c-%e') as created_time, date_format(a.register_end_date,'%Y-%c-%e') as register_end_date, concat('https://m.QuartzExt.com/bidding/detail-',a.uid,'.html?registerSource=zb-dx-xzts') as shortURL, concat(ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name),bbf.category_name,'招标公告') as newTitle from b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcement_categories ca on a.uid=ca.bid_announcement_uid INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest bbf on ca.category_code=bbf.category_code INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_area item on a.uid=item.bid_announcement_uid left JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_ann_register_condition cond on a.uid=cond.bid_announcement_uid left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area area on area.item_code = item.service_area left join ( select uid as item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register where supplier_id = @supplier_id and bid_announcement_uid=@item_id ) r on a.uid=r.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c on a.developer_uid=c.developer_id left JOIN ( SELECT company_id,supplier_id FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier a WHERE a.status = 3 AND a.is_del = 0 and supplier_id=@supplier_id ) black on c.developer_id=black.company_id where a.uid=@item_id and r.item_id is null AND c.company_name not like 'test_%' and black.company_id is null GROUP BY a.uid
